length you worked the leg for decrease round k until 2 sts before the first instep marker k 2tog sl marker work across instep to second marker sl marker ssk work to end this will have been row 2 of the chart the next row will be stranded again plain round work whole round according to chart as the chart only has a repeat of 2 sts you just need to make sure you start both the beginning of the round and the first st of the instep with the firt st of the chart but even if you should get muddled up somewhere believe me it happens it should be very easy to get back on track after the next plain section repeat these two rounds until you are back with the total number of sts that you started out with i e 64/72/80 sts all around foot keep working without decreases according to the charts and starting back with chart a after com- pleting chart d until you have knitted up to 2 inches / 5 cms less than your total foot length i would suggest that you work in a solid colour once you have
